detect_mimetype(file_data)

[Source]

    # File lib/injections/attachment_fu_mime_type.rb, line 16
16:   def detect_mimetype(file_data)
17:     if file_data.content_type.strip == "application/octet-stream"
18:       return File.mime_type?(file_data.original_filename)
19:     else
20:       return file_data.content_type
21:     end
22:   end
uploaded_data=(file_data)

Overriding this method to allow content_type to be detected when swfupload submits images with content_type set to ‘application/octet-stream‘

[Source]

    # File lib/injections/attachment_fu_mime_type.rb, line 4
 4:   def uploaded_data=(file_data)
 5:     return nil if file_data.nil? || file_data.size == 0
 6:     self.content_type = detect_mimetype(file_data)
 7:     self.filename     = file_data.original_filename if respond_to?(:filename)
 8:     if file_data.is_a?(StringIO)
 9:       file_data.rewind
10:       self.temp_data = file_data.read
11:     else
12:       self.temp_path = file_data.path
13:     end
14:   end
